features.description: Install command downloads and installs skill locally
features.notes: Created install.tsx with findSkill() and downloadSkillFiles() functions. Uses GitHub API to fetch tree and download files. Records in config via addInstalledSkill().
--global flag changes install path from ./.claude/skills/ to ~/.claude/skills/. Scope stored as 'global' in InstalledSkill config.
Progress UI shows 4 steps with status icons (done/in_progress/pending). ProgressBar component shows percentage. Completion shows success message with version and location.

features.description: Uninstall removes skill files and config
features.notes: Created uninstall.tsx with confirmation prompt. Uses rm() with recursive/force options. Calls removeInstalledSkill() to update config. --force skips confirmation.

steps: Verify table with name, type, repo, version
features.notes: List command shows name, version, scope, repo, and installedPath for each skill. Tested with empty state showing correct message.

steps: Verify current and latest version shown
features.notes: Updated list.tsx with checkForUpdate() that compares commit SHAs. Shows current version and latest version with arrow. Suggests upgrade command.

features.description: Upgrade command updates skill to latest
steps: Verify config updated with new SHA
features.notes: Created upgrade.tsx that checks for updates, downloads new files (removes old first), and updates config with new SHA. Supports single skill or all skills.
Created info.tsx that shows skill metadata from SKILL.md frontmatter. Shows name, version, description, type, author, tags, source repo, install location (if installed), and commit SHA.

metadata.cleanup_notes: Session 2: Removed redundant commands (repos, whoami, skills, demo, repo sync), added Biome for formatting/linting
